welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Lousada, Portugal! This charming city is known for its stunning landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Lousada has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Braga Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and some charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vila Real Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at Vila Real Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
